targets.expr:
#=== CPU per benchmark (id), test(instance), run ==================================
max( # Maximum of CPU over the three runs for a test (instance) of a specific CNI (id) 
    avg( # CPU average over all servers within the same run (client and server)
        sum( # CPU sum over all cores (cpu) and mode (user/system/softirq/...) for each server of every run
            rate(statexec_cpu_seconds_total{id=~"$id",instance=~"$test",mode!="idle"}[40s])
        ) by (id,instance,run,role)
    ) by (id,instance,run)
) by (id)
# All tests run during 60s after 10s prequel and 20scd cooldown. 
# Timerange must be beween 00:00:00 UTC and 00:01:30, on Jan the 1st of 2024
# Then we can take the average cpu over 40s duration, 30s before the end of the range (aka between 00:00:30 and 00:01:00)
@ ( end() - 30 )

(# CNI CPU
    #=== CPU per benchmark (id), test(instance), run ==================================
    max( # Maximum of CPU over the three runs for a test (instance) of a specific CNI (id) 
        avg( # CPU average over all servers within the same run (client and server)
            sum( # CPU sum over all cores (cpu) and mode (user/system/softirq/...) for each server of every run
                rate(statexec_cpu_seconds_total{id=~"$id",instance=~"$test",mode!="idle"}[40s])
            ) by (id,instance,run,role)
        ) by (id,instance,run)
    ) by (id)
    # All tests run during 60s after 10s prequel and 20scd cooldown. 
    # Timerange must be beween 00:00:00 UTC and 00:01:30, on Jan the 1st of 2024
    # Then we can take the average cpu over 40s duration, 30s before the end of the range (aka between 00:00:30 and 00:01:00)
    @ ( end() - 30 )
)
-
(# Baremetal CPU
    #=== CPU per benchmark (id), test(instance), run ==================================
    max( # Maximum of CPU over the three runs for a test (instance) of a specific CNI (id) 
        avg( # CPU average over all servers within the same run (client and server)
            sum( # CPU sum over all cores (cpu) and mode (user/system/softirq/...) for each server of every run
                rate(statexec_cpu_seconds_total{id="baremetal",instance=~"$test",mode!="idle"}[40s])
            ) by (id,instance,run,role)
        ) by (id,instance,run)
    )
    # All tests run during 60s after 10s prequel and 20scd cooldown. 
    # Timerange must be beween 00:00:00 UTC and 00:01:30, on Jan the 1st of 2024
    # Then we can take the average cpu over 40s duration, 30s before the end of the range (aka between 00:00:30 and 00:01:00)
    @ ( end() - 30 )
)

(# CPU summary
    #=== CPU per benchmark (id), test(instance), run ==================================
    max( # Maximum of CPU over the three runs for a test (instance) of a specific CNI (id) 
        avg( # CPU average over all servers within the same run (client and server)
            sum( # CPU sum over all cores (cpu) and mode (user/system/softirq/...) for each server of every run
                rate(statexec_cpu_seconds_total{id=~"$id",instance=~"$test",mode!="idle"}[40s])
            ) by (id,instance,run,role)
        ) by (id,instance,run)
    ) by (id)
    # All tests run during 60s after 10s prequel and 20scd cooldown. 
    # Timerange must be beween 00:00:00 UTC and 00:01:30, on Jan the 1st of 2024
    # Then we can take the average cpu over 40s duration, 30s before the end of the range (aka between 00:00:30 and 00:01:00)
    @ ( end() - 30 )
)

options.content:
Kubernetes CNI benchmark 2024-01

by infraBuilder and BlackSwift

panels.title: [$id_a] Variance coefficient of bandwidth by test
[$id_b] Variance coefficient of bandwidth by test
IDLE - System metrics when there is no traffic

options.content:
Test naming : `[ds][tu][sm]`
- `[ds]` : Direct mode (ip to ip) or via Service (pod to service)
- `[tu]` : Tcp or Udp protocol
- `[sm]` : Single stream or Multi streams (8 threads iperf3)

Exemples: `dus` stands for Direct Udp Singlestream, `stm` is Service Tcp Multistream

---

Repo: https://github.com/InfraBuilder/benchmark-k8s-cni-2024-01/

Twitter : [@infrabuilder](https://twitter.com/infrabuilder) - [@BlackSwiftFR](https://twitter.com/blackswiftfr)

Web : [infraBuilder.com](https://infrabuilder.com) - [BlackSwift.fr](https://www.blackswift.fr)

list.label: Tests
list.name: test
list.query: dts, dtm, dus, dum, sts, stm, sus, sum
